text: Les Premiers-Sapins is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Nods (the seat), Athose, Chasnans, Hautepierre-le-Châtelet, Rantechaux and Vanclans.Arrêté du 30 novembre 2015 portant création de la commune nouvelle de Les Premiers Sapins, Journal officiel de la République française, 26 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Les Premiers-Sapins
